content.text:
Let me analyze this task systematically:

1. Target Structure Analysis:
- The structure consists of 3 layers
- Bottom layer: 3 orange cylindrical columns
- Middle layer: 1 yellow rectangular block spanning the orange columns
- Top layer: 1 green rectangular column and 1 yellow curved block on top

2. Block Selection from Dictionary:
Required blocks:
- Orange cylindrical columns (index 10, 11)
- Yellow rectangular block (index 5 or 6)
- Green rectangular column (index 2)
- Yellow curved block (index 12)

3. Assembly Instructions:
{
    Step1: Move block with index 10 (orange cylinder)
    Step2: Move block with index 11 (orange cylinder)
    Step3: Move block with index 10 (orange cylinder)
    Step4: Move block with index 5 (yellow rectangular block)
    Step5: Move block with index 2 (green rectangular column)
    Step6: Move block with index 12 (yellow curved block)
}

This sequence will recreate the target structure by placing the orange columns first, then the yellow rectangular block across them, followed by the green column, and finally the yellow curved block on top.
